Entries.default: "Oh, good. This is much better. The one thing we were missing was being incinerated by a bomb."
"That would have been terribly handy in my academy days."
"Belfetto! If this truly bends time, that means eventually we Vailians will have the same power."
"You move time like it is water. Ekera, incredible."
"Mind if I borrow that power? There's some decisions I've been meaning to revisit."
"I - I've seen this moment in my dreams."
"Felt like falling out of a tapestry and into a painting."
"Incredible. If only I could scrutinize my experiments at such leisure!"
"Playing with time magic is a good way to get in trouble, postenago."
"You could play such tricks with this!"
"Oh, good. This is much better. The one thing we were missing was being incinerated by Durance's bomb."
